org.qbroker.net

Class RMQConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qbroker.net.RMQConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Connector
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RMQMessenger

    public class RMQConnector
extends java.lang.Object
implements Connector
    RMQConnector connects to an exchange on a RabbitMQ server and initializes the channel, the queue and the bindings for operations, such as check, get and pub.
    Author:
    yannanlu@yahoo.com

      • get

        public byte[] get(boolean autoAck,
                  long timeout,
                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> props)
           throws java.io.IOException
        It waits for a message up to timeout in ms. Upon received a message, it returns byte array of the message body and fills in the property map with RabbitMQ properties. If timeout is 0 or less, there is no wait. If there is no message received, it returns null.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
